attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyone has days through the year when they wake up thinking they would rather spend an hour or 10 in bed instead of going to work. Now if this happened alot of people would be out of work so I propose have a set of national duvet days where we would be allowed to stay home as long as we stayed under our Duvets!!!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
